name: Mission2Mir
overview: 2050 A.D. The world has been under attack and is destroyed by aliens. You are Roger Smith, a cosmo pilot, who has survived the attack by leaving with your spaceship just on time. To your knowledge, next to lots of innocent victims, all retro home computers including all MSX computers are destroyed during the attack. Just when you almost gave up hope to ever play retro games again, you receive a message of the former Russian intellegance service: Dear Roger, despite of earlier reports that space station Mir was destroyed in 2001, inner sources confirm that space station Mir never has been destroyed at all. Last years the station has been in use as a secret Russian testing base. At the moment it is floating steerless in space. Roger Smith, please enter the fight with the aliens and save the last MSX computer in the univers... your Mission 2 Mir starts!
